name: Resume Templates
description:
Job searching is hard. 

Making a resume from a blank canvas sometimes feels even harder. 

I designed this resume template to help ease the pain of making your own. 


What does this include?

  • Six completely designed resume templates in light and dark mode using Auto-Layout.
  • Responsive any size / length your resume is.
  • Encouraging placeholder text to give you ideas on what to write.
  • Entire Figma file for you to dig into how I made this! 
  • A template laid out for the most optimal + efficient way for eyes to scan


Who this is for:

  • People who are looking to spice up their resume.
  • People who want to stand out in the stack of digital of resumes.
  • People who are job hunting!


Project your value through a resume and let's help you land that job.

Any questions - find me on twitter @tsantsai
